creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: massive hollow torque in two sections with hinge and lock; lower sections major motifs from proper right to proper left include: phoenix, dragon, and lion; secondary motifs: fish-like creatures, floral and foliate motifs; outer edge of entire piece is scalloped with band of dots on outer and inner edges; upper section has floral and foliate motif; all motifs are in a relief (see also 2007.17.385)
title: Torque
